alert.note: Alert for Norman; West Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 8:03PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Norman, southwestern Polk, southeastern Grand Forks, Traill and east central Steele Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 803 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Manvel to near Thompson to near Portland. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Grand Forks, East Grand Forks, Crookston, Mayville, Hillsboro, Thompson and Hatton. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 96 and 147. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
